alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 4:00PM CDT until April 20 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Scott County in west central Illinois... Southeastern Morgan County in west central Illinois... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glasgow, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Manchester around 405 PM CDT. Murrayville around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Woodson, Franklin, Alexander and Waverly. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 58 and 79. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
